instruction: Show all PowerShell process executions
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*powershell.exe" | table _time Computer User CommandLine

instruction: Find all processes executed from temp directories
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*\\Temp\\*" | table _time Computer User Image CommandLine

instruction: Display cmd.exe executions
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*cmd.exe" | table _time Computer User ParentImage CommandLine

instruction: Show processes created by a specific user
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 User="DOMAIN\\jsmith" | table _time Computer Image CommandLine

instruction: Find all wscript or cscript executions
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 (Image="*wscript.exe" OR Image="*cscript.exe") | table _time Computer User CommandLine

instruction: List all processes executed from Downloads folder
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*\\Downloads\\*" | table _time Computer User Image

instruction: Show processes with admin in the filename
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*admin*" | table _time Computer User Image CommandLine

instruction: Find all rundll32 executions
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*rundll32.exe" | table _time Computer User CommandLine

instruction: Display processes on a specific computer
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Computer="WORKSTATION01" | table _time User Image CommandLine

instruction: Show all regsvr32 process creations
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 Image="*regsvr32.exe" | table _time Computer User CommandLine

instruction: Show all network connections from a specific process
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 Image="*chrome.exe" | table _time Computer DestinationIp DestinationPort

instruction: Find all outbound connections on port 443
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 DestinationPort=443 Initiated=true | table _time Computer Image DestinationIp

instruction: Display connections to a specific IP address
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 DestinationIp="203.0.113.100" | table _time Computer Image User DestinationPort

instruction: Show PowerShell network connections
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 Image="*powershell.exe" | table _time Computer DestinationIp DestinationPort

instruction: Find all connections to port 445 SMB
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 DestinationPort=445 | table _time Computer Image DestinationIp User

instruction: List cmd.exe network connections
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 Image="*cmd.exe" | table _time Computer DestinationIp DestinationPort Protocol

instruction: Show outbound RDP connections
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 DestinationPort=3389 Initiated=true | table _time Computer User DestinationIp

instruction: Find connections from a specific computer
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 Computer="WS-FINANCE-01" | table _time Image DestinationIp DestinationPort

instruction: Display all initiated TCP connections
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 Protocol=tcp Initiated=true | table _time Computer Image DestinationIp DestinationPort

instruction: Show connections to high ports
output: sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=3 DestinationPort>10000 | table _time Computer Image DestinationIp DestinationPort
